definitions.definition: a chemical substance that neutralizes alkalis, dissolves some metals, and turns litmus red; typically, a corrosive or sour-tasting liquid of this kind.
examples: rainwater is a very weak acid

definitions.definition: bitter or cutting remarks or tone of voice.
examples: she was unable to quell the acid in her voice

definitions.definition: a molecule or other entity that can donate a proton or accept an electron pair in reactions.
